connect_project.connect_network_to_connect_project: Please connect to the internet to enable connecting to a project
connect_project.engage_the_wider_community_to_check_scri: Engage the wider community to ensure that the translation is clear, accurate, and natural. Select verses, ask targeted questions, allow discussion of answers.
connect_project.error_fetching_resources: There was an error fetching the Digital Bible Library resources. You will only be able to select projects.
connect_project.no_connectable_projects: Looks like there are no connectable projects for you.{{ newLine }}Please go to Paratext to register a project to connect to.
connect_project.only_paratext_admins_can_start: ** You must be the Paratext Administrator of a project to start it here. Ask your Administrator to connect to your project then you can also connect to it here after that.
connect_project.paratext_account_linked_to_another_user: You have logged into a Paratext account that is already linked to a user with the email {{ email }}. You will be logged out of your current account and proceed as the Paratext user.
connect_project.problem_already_connected: The project is already connected. Maybe another project administrator connected the project at the same time. Please try again. If it continues to be a problem, please report the issue so we can get it fixed.
connect_project.select_project_or_resource: Select the Paratext project or Digital Bible Library resource that your project is based on. If your project is based on a Paratext project, it's best to set it up as a daughter project in Paratext.
connect_project.translation_suggestions_require_source_t: Note: Translation suggestions are only available if a source text is selected.
connect_project.you_must_be_logged_in_to_paratext: You must login with your Paratext account to connect to a project.

delete_project_dialog.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
delete_project_dialog.delete_cannot_be_undone: This action {{ boldStart }}cannot{{ boldEnd }} be undone. This will permanently delete the {{ boldStart }}{{ projectName }}{{ boldEnd }} project, translation data, questions, answers, and comments.
delete_project_dialog.i_understand_the_consequences: I understand the consequences, delete this project
delete_project_dialog.please_type_project_name: Please type in the name of the project to confirm.

draft_add_dialog.book_contents_will_be_overwritten: Warning, this will overwrite any data in your project for the book of {{ bookName }}.

draft_generation.back_translation_requirement: Back translation drafts can only be generated into the roughly 200 [link:supportedLanguagesUrl]supported languages[/link].
draft_generation.criteria_project_language_not_in_nllb_wi: Your project language of [em]"{{ targetLanguageDisplayName }}"[/em] is not a supported language.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_cancellation_messag: Canceling will reset progress for this draft request. You will still be able to use the last completed draft.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_regeneration_messag: Creating a new draft will delete the existing draft.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_regeneration_title: Are you done with the current draft?
draft_generation.draft_active_detail: Generating draft; this usually takes at least {{ count }} hours.
draft_generation.draft_queued_detail_multiple: The translation draft generation is number {{ count }} in the queue, and will begin once the server is finished with other projects. Please check back later.
draft_generation.draft_queued_detail: Generation of the translation draft has been queued, and will begin once the server is finished with another project. Please check back later.
draft_generation.go_to_draft_viewer: Go to [link:draftViewerUrl]draft viewer[/link] to preview and apply the generated draft to chapters of your choice.
draft_generation.info_alert_different_additional_training: The language for your additional training text ({{ additionalTrainingSourceLanguageDisplayName }}) must be the same as the training source language ({{ alternateTrainingSourceLanguageDisplayName }}). Select a different additional training text on the [link:projectSettingsUrl]settings page[/link].
draft_generation.info_alert_different_training_and_source: The language for your alternate training text ({{ alternateTrainingSourceLanguageDisplayName }}) must be the same as the source language ({{ sourceLanguageDisplayName }}). Select a different alternate training text on the [link:projectSettingsUrl]settings page[/link].
draft_generation.info_alert_last_sync_failed: Your project failed to synchronize. It will be synchronized when you next generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_source_access: You do not have access to the translation source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_alternate_source_access: You do not have access to the drafting source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_alternate_training_source_: You do not have access to the training source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_download_error: There was a problem downloading your draft. Please check your Internet connection and try again in several minutes.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_additional_training_source: You do not have access to the additional training source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_same_source_and_target_langua: The language for your source text must be different than the target language ({{ targetLanguageDisplayName }}). Select a different source text on the [link:projectSettingsUrl]settings page[/link].
draft_generation.info_alert_source_text_not_selected: Your project has no source text selected. This is required in order to produce a draft translation. Select a source text on the [link:projectSettingsUrl]settings page[/link].
draft_generation.instructions_draft_process: Generating a draft usually takes at least {{ count }} hours.
draft_generation.instructions_draft_process_subtext: It can take much longer when the system is busy.
draft_generation.instructions_help: For more information, { 1 } see the help site{ 2 }.
draft_generation.instructions_keep_in_mind_subtext: You will need to edit the draft that is generated after adding it to your project.
draft_generation.instructions_scripture_forge_assist_back: Scripture Forge can assist with drafting a back translation.

If your team has already drafted one or more books and then back translated one or more of them, Scripture Forge can use the back translated books to generate a draft of the next book you are working on.
draft_generation.instructions_scripture_forge_assist_forw: Scripture Forge can assist with drafting a translation.
Based on your existing translation progress you can use the books you have already translated to generate a draft of the next book you are working on.
draft_generation.offline_message: Draft generation is not available when offline.
draft_generation.preview_last_draft_detail: The last draft build did not complete, but you can still view the most recent successful draft.
draft_generation.warning_generation_faulted: Last generation attempt failed. Click [em]"{{ generateButtonText }}"[/em] below to try again.
draft_generation.click_book_to_preview: Click a book below to preview the draft and add it to your project.

draft_generation_steps.fast_training_warning: Enabling this will save time but greatly reduce accuracy.
draft_generation_steps.no_available_books: You have no books available for drafting.

draft_generation_steps.unusable_target_books: Can't find the book you're looking for? Be sure the book is created in Paratext, then sync your project.

draft_preview_books.draft_successfully_applied: The draft for {{ bookName }} has been successfully applied to your project.
draft_preview_books.one_or_more_drafts_failed: Drafts of one or more chapters failed to be applied. View the chapters in the book to see which chapters had drafts applied successfully.
draft_preview_books.no_permission_to_edit_book: You do not have permission to write to this book. Contact your project administrator to get permission.

editor.project_data_out_of_sync: Your project data is out of sync. Please synchronize your project to edit this text.
editor.project_text_not_editable: Text in this project is not editable. This setting can be changed in Paratext.
editor.text_doc_corrupted: This chapter cannot be edited because the data has become corrupted.

import_questions_confirmation_dialog.edited_questions_explanation: Some of the questions you have selected have been edited. Are you sure you want to update the questions? Select the questions you want to update.

import_questions_dialog.canceling_import_not_remove_questions: Note: Cancelling will not delete questions that are already imported.
import_questions_dialog.csv_instructions:
Create a spreadsheet with a column for the reference and a column for the question, as shown below:
Export or save the spreadsheet as a CSV or TSV file.
Click {{ boldStart }}{{ importFromCsvFile }}{{ boldEnd }} below and select the file.
import_questions_dialog.csv_questions_duplicates: Note: Some of the selected questions are exact duplicates of questions that are already part of your project. They will not be re-imported.
import_questions_dialog.help_options: If you need help with either of these import methods, ask a question on { 1 }the community support site{ 2 }, or reach out to the team at { 3 }{ 4 }.
import_questions_dialog.invalid_csv_rows_will_be_skipped: These rows in the CSV file were invalid and will be skipped.
import_questions_dialog.missing_header_row: The file you imported needs to have a header row with columns titled {{ boldStart }}Reference{{ boldEnd }} and {{ boldStart }}Question{{ boldEnd }}.
import_questions_dialog.network_error_transcelerator: Network error fetching Transcelerator questions. Retrying ({{ count }}).
import_questions_dialog.no_questions_available: There are no questions for the books in this project.
import_questions_dialog.no_transcelerator_offline: Importing from Transcelerator is not available offline.
import_questions_dialog.question: Question
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_instructions:
Translate the questions in Transcelerator.
Within Transcelerator, export the questions to Scripture Forge.
Send and receive the project in Paratext.
Sync the project in Scripture Forge.
Click {{ boldStart }}{{ importFromTranscelerator }}{{ boldEnd }} below.
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_paratext: {1}Transcelerator{2} is a plugin for {3}Paratext{4} to aid with creating and translating scripture checking questions.
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_some_questions_already_im: Note: Some selected questions have already been imported. Questions that have been edited in Transcelerator will be updated in Scripture Forge, and exact duplicates will be skipped.
import_questions_dialog.update_transcelerator: The version of Transcelerator used in this project is not supported. Please update to at least Transcelerator version 1.5.3.

roles.offline: Changing roles & permissions is unavailable while offline.
roles.roles_from_pt_cannot_be_changed: Roles can only be changed in Paratext

role_descriptions.pt_administrator: Edit translations - manage notes and questions - manage users and settings - sync with Paratext
role_descriptions.pt_consultant: View translation - view questions & answers - add notes
role_descriptions.pt_observer: View translation - view questions & answers - view notes
role_descriptions.pt_translator: Edit translations - view questions - add answers - add notes - sync with Paratext

settings.biblical_terms_will_be_enabled: Biblical Terms will be displayed and can be updated in Scripture Forge
settings.connect_network_to_change_settings: Project settings cannot be changed while offline. Please connect to the internet to make changes.
settings.delete_project_cannot_be_undone: Once you delete a project, there is no going back. Please be certain.
settings.enable_additional_training_source: Add another source to use for training
settings.enable_alternate_source: Use a different source for drafting
settings.enable_alternate_training_source: Use a different source for training
settings.enable_translation_suggestions: to enable {{ boldStart }}Translate Suggestions{{ boldEnd }} and see more options
settings.engage_the_wider_community: Engage the wider community to ensure that the translation is clear, accurate, and natural. Select verses, ask questions, and discuss answers.
settings.error_fetching_projects_resources: There was an error fetching projects and resources. You can't change what the project is based on.
settings.error_fetching_projects: There was an error fetching projects. You will only be able to select resources from Digital Bible Library.
settings.error_fetching_resources: There was an error fetching the Digital Bible Library resources. You will only be able to select projects.
settings.export_checking_answers: Set which answers will be exported as comments when syncing with Paratext.
settings.invite_others: Administrators can always invite people from the {{ templateTagBoundary }}Users{{ templateTagBoundary }} page.
settings.pre_translation_additional_training_data: These are two column CSV files specially crafted to provide training data pairs.
settings.pre_translation_alternate_source_info: Select a different source for drafting, if your currently selected source is not to be used for pre-translation drafting.
settings.pre_translation_alternate_training_sourc: Selecting a separate translation for training, such as a back translation, can improve drafting quality.
settings.pre_translation_drafting_description: Configure options for generating translation drafts.
settings.pre_translation_additional_training_sour: Select another translation in the source language to combine with your training source
settings.pre_translation_send_all_segments_info: For these to be pre-translated, your translation structure must match your source exactly.
settings.see_others_answers_and_comments: Allow checkers to see each other's answers and comments
settings.select_project_or_resource: Select the Paratext project or Digital Bible Library resource that your project is based on. If your project is based on a Paratext project, it's best to set it up as a daughter project in Paratext.
settings.serval_config_description: {{ boldStart }}Warning:{{ boldEnd }} The following configuration is for Serval technicians only:
settings.shareTranslate: Allow users of Translate to invite others
settings.shareChecking: Allow users of Community Checking to invite others
settings.source_projects_cannot_be_deleted: Another project is based on this project and so it cannot be deleted.
settings.translation_suggestions_require_source_t: Note: Translation suggestions are only available if a source text is selected.
settings.translations_will_be_suggested: Translations for words and phrases will be suggested as you edit Scripture based on the project or resource selected above.
settings.users_can_share_the_project: Allow users to invite people outside Paratext to the project. They will receive the same role as the user who invited them.
settings.checkers_listen_to_scripture_audio: Checkers will need to listen to Scripture audio.
settings.will_not_delete_paratext_project: This will {{ boldStart }}not{{ boldEnd }} delete your Paratext project, but it will delete any unsynchronized data stored in Scripture Forge. It is recommended to {{ templateTagBoundary }}Synchronize{{ templateTagBoundary }} first before deleting.

sync.connect_network_to_synchronize: Please connect to the internet to synchronize this project
sync.something_went_wrong_synchronizing_this_: Something went wrong while synchronizing {{ projectName }} with Paratext. Please try again.
sync.sync_is_disabled: Synchronization for this project needed to be disabled, so it is not available at this time. Please contact {{ email }} to discuss what needs to be done so project synchronization can be enabled again.
sync.sync_failure_support_message: Something went wrong the last time Scripture Forge attempted to synchronize the project with Paratext. If it still doesn't work after you try again, please report the problem by writing to {{email}}.

training_data_multi_select.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this training data?

training_data_upload_dialog.no_upload_offline: Training data cannot be uploaded without connecting to the internet.

translate_overview.cannot_train_suggestion_engine: Translation suggestions are unavailable. Please select a source project that shares books in common with this project to get translation suggestions.
translate_overview.not_enough_verses_translated: Translation suggestions are unavailable. Please ensure that there are at least 10 matching verses translated in the source and target projects.
translate_overview.warn_font_unsupported: The font selected for this project, {{ selectedFont }}, is not supported. {{ fallbackFont }} is used instead.
translate_overview.warn_font_requires_graphite: The font selected for this project, {{ selectedFont }}, can only be rendered by web browsers that support Graphite. This means it will only work in Firefox, except on iOS devices, where it will not work even in Firefox. In browsers that do not support Graphite, {{ fallbackFont }} is used instead.
translate_overview.contact_for_help: If this does not meet the needs of this project, please contact us for help.
translate_overview.change_font_or_contact_for_help: If this does not meet the needs of this project, please select a different font in the Paratext project settings, or contact us for help.

warnings.login_cookie_deletion: Logging out will remove your ability to log back into this account. Are you sure you want to log out?
warnings.paratext_credentials_expired: Your Paratext user credentials have expired. Please log out and log back in again.
